name: NINJA STORM 2
description: The tornado of fierce ninja action that is Naruto Shippuden hits Xbox 360® for the first time! NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Ultimate Ninja®: STORM 2 brings refined fighting mechanics, a rich story mode with deep replay value, and the first online play ever in the Ultimate Ninja franchise. Stunning graphics and real time animations place the player inside a living manga world packed with dramatic 3D boss battles against over 40 characters. See who's really the Ultimate Ninja by taking on real competitors online, while taking showmanship to a new level with a card system that allows players to show their ninja style. NARUTO SHIPPUDEN™: Ultimate Ninja®: STORM 2 is nothing less than the most electrifying, visually powerful fighting-adventure game ever.
